questions.question: What does prêt-à-porter mean?
questions.info: Prêt-à-porter is French term for ready to wear, the term for factory made clothing that needs little to no alterations.

questions.question: Which designer is famous for the wrap dress?
questions.info: Diane von Furstenberg first introduced the knitted jersey wrap dress in 1974.

questions.question: Who designed the cone bra that Madonna wore?
questions.info: Gaultier produced many costumes for Madonna during the nineties, starting with her infamous cone bra for her 1990 Blond Ambition World Tour.

questions.question: Who is the current designer for Chanel?
questions.info: Lagerfeld has designed for Chanel since 1983.

questions.question: Who invented the LBD?
questions.info: The concept of the little black dress is often cited as one of Coco Chanel's contributions to the fashion lexicon.
